column4: is there a guide somewhere that i can look at on how to load the propriatary drivers for my Radeon Vid card?
I wouldn't recommend deviating from System -> Administration -> Hardware drivers.  But if you must, the driver download section at amd.com has a guide for the non-repository versions

your card may not be supported.  You can still grab the drivers from AMD, but be prepared for complications in the future.  I've had nothing but headaches when I've ran them, mostly stemming from updates
